original: 遼東太守公孫淵部將，公孫淵叛魏，司馬懿率軍討伐，楊祚奉命率軍相抗，屢戰屢敗，最終於襄平城投降。
text: The general of Gongsunyuan, the prefect of Liaodong, Gongsunyuan rebelled against Wei, Sima Yi led his army to fight against him, Yang Zuo was ordered to lead his army to fight, and defeated repeatedly, and finally surrendered in Xiangping City.
